text: “allāh veta æti mīṭat vaḍā napuru phalavipāka (at kara gat ayava) mā obaṭa dænum dennada?”yi (nabiyē! oba ovungen vimasā), “allāh kavurunva śāpa kara, ovun mata kōpayaṭa patva, ovungen samaharekuva van̆duran bavaṭada, ūran bavaṭada pat kaḷēda ovunda, kavurun boru devivarunva namadinnōda ovunda, itāmat bāla vargayē ayayi. tavada ovun ṛju mārgayen værada giya ayayi” yayi oba pavasanu (mænava)
